climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: FACIAL CLEANSER FOR NORMAL TO DRY SKIN: This gentle, soap-free daily face wash cleanses gently while maintaining your skin’s natural moisture, making it ideal for normal to dry skin.
MADE WITH TIME-TESTED INGREDIENTS: The Himalaya Botanique premium personal care range is made with top-quality ingredients and crafted with the traditional wisdom of Ayurveda

LIFTS IMPURITIES, MOISTURIZES, REFRESHES AND MORE: Bael Fruit lifts impurities, Organic Aloe Vera moisturizes your skin, Organic Winter Melon supports your skin’s elasticity and Cinnamon invigorates your skin, while Lavender oil soothes and refreshes.
FREE FROM COMMON CONCERNS: Free from parabens, SLS, phthalates, petroleum, silicones, artificial fragrances and artificial colors, yet you still get the sensory experience you expect.
NO ANIMAL TESTING: We care about our furry friends. That is why we never test our personal care products on animals.
body.description: Let Hydrating Aloe Vera and Winter Melon lift your dry skin back to life! After washing, your face feels dry and stretched? Unlike common soaps and washes, Himalaya Hydrating Face Wash adds new levels of welcome moisture for pure, smooth & healthy-looking skin. Especially designed for Normal to Dry Skin to nourish, protect and soothe Dermatologist tested & hypoallergenic Aloe Vera moisturizes your skin while Bael Fruit and Winter Melon clean and refresh No Parabens, SLS, No phthalates, No gluten, No artificial colors, No synthetic fragrances Does not contain animal ingredients

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Since 1930, we are on a mission to make the world well one person at a time. Our premium Personal Care range is made with certified Organic ingredients Crafted with the traditional wisdom of Ayurveda Free from: parabens, SLS, phthalates, petroleum, silicones, artificial fragrances or colors No compromise on sensory pleasure No animal testing Let Hydrating Aloe Vera and Winter Melon lift your dry skin back to life! After washing, your face feels dry and stretched? Unlike common soaps and washes, Himalaya Hydrating Face Wash adds new levels of welcome moisture for pure, smooth & healthy-looking skin. Especially designed for Normal to Dry Skin to nourish, protect and soothe Dermatologist tested & hypoallergenic Aloe Vera moisturizes your skin while Bael Fruit and Winter Melon clean and refresh No Parabens, SLS, No phthalates, No gluten, No artificial colors, No synthetic fragrances Does not contain animal ingredients

Aloe Vera One of history’s most famous moisturizers, Aloe Vera adds new levels of comfort and moisture for normal to dry skin. Its ancient wisdom adds incredible hydration. Winter Melon Winter Melon has invigorating properties and supports hydration, suppleness and skin elasticity for glowing, radiant, healthy-looking skin. Bael Fruit Bael Fruit gently lifts impurities from your skin, deep cleans your pores and allows your skin to breathe again. You’ll feel fresh, clean and cool every time.

No harm to the little guys We care about our furry friends. We never test our toothpastes on animals. Their smiles are just fine without us! No unwanted extras We care about what goes into our toothpastes. That’s why we say no to parabens, SLS, phthalates, artificial fragrances and colors.* Wise & effective ingredients Himalaya Botanique Facial Care products call on time-tested Ayurvedic herbs and add Vitamin E to leave your skin feeling soft and moisturized after cleansing.

Oral Care Do you want all of the clean with none of the compromise? Himalaya Botanique Toothpastes are free from Fluoride, SLS, Triclosan, Gluten and more, yet still taste and foam wonderfully, making brushing a joy! Skin Cleansing Luxurious Body Bars bring sensory pleasure and refreshed, clean skin. Himalaya Purifying Neem & Turmeric and Refreshing Rosemary & Lavender Cleansing Body Bars always leave your skin clean, cool and comforted. Body Balms Blending Mint, Eucalyptus and Rosemary with essential oils, Himalaya Balms bring soothing comfort to your muscles and chest to help you relax and feel good again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this face wash!
reviews.reviewText: I have sensitive skin and this face wash is as good as gold to me. Been using it for years and its the only thing that doesn't dry out my face or break me out. Cleans off any makeup like a pro and leaves my skin feeling soft. Good ingredients and none of the chemicals!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Moisturizing, Hydrating and Affordable
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this product. I had a hard time finding something that moisturized my skin since I have dry skin. And using this product helped so much! Always makes my skin feel super soft and hydrated and smells so good. Not to mention the price being very affordable! Definitely going to be using this product from now on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love this product!
reviews.reviewText: I really enjoy this face wash, I have mostly dry skin but also have really sensitive skin and anything makes me get mini breakouts. This is one of the only face washes that does not make my face react! It also is amazing at taking off makeup, I don't even need a makeup remover. The smell is pleasant and I like the micro exfoliator in it. The only thing I don't like is that it doesn't help my dry spots at all and they still look dry, but other than that, I won't use a different product because this is so reliable!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My New Favorite
reviews.reviewText: I'd been using various natural face washes...I think the last one was Alba with fruit enzymes. There was another one with an orange scent, and I can't remember the rest. Basically all unremarkable. Until this. I saw this on Pinterest, and thought to give it a try. I absolutely LOVE it. I use it in my evening shower.Make sure your face is wet. If you start with a wet face, you only need a dab the size of a pinto bean or a large pea. It goes on slick, like a gel. It smears all over your face quickly. If you use it this way, one bottle will last a long time. It took my make-up off. I don't wear waterproof mascara, just regular. It took it off, without leaving black rings underneath my eyes. It has small bits of grit in it, but there doesn't seem to be enough to exfoliate. I don't love the gritty particles, but that's just me. (If I wanted to exfoliate, they have a scrub).Overall, I'm just pleased with how clean my face feels after I use it. It doesn't dry my skin out too much. I have gone without a moisturizer after using it, without feeling too tight. Like I said, my previous natural face washes have been unremarkable. this one stands out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2011
reviews.reviewText: Both my teenage daughter and I have started using this cleanser. We would usually use a natural glycerin bar soap, but I bought the lotion from this line and loved it so I thought I would try the cleanser too. Glad I did. We have used this for the past week or two and it doesn't seem to clog pores and it doesn't smell bad. It has a very slight tingly effect that is very nice. Our faces feel smooth and clean. We both use the Clairsonic (we LOVE our Clairsonics) and it this is a great cleanser to use with it. I would recommend this to anyone who uses natural products. It's a keeper!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A nice, gentle moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: I have sensitive, oily skin. This is great forl sensitive skin, smells nice and subtle, and degreases my face well without drying me out. A little bit goes a long way - it foams up nicely......just watch your hair. Occasionally, when I wash my face in the morning, I get some of this in my hairline. Since it's so bubbly it's hard to get out, and it dries hard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Himalaya Invigorating Face Wash
reviews.reviewText: I finally found a soothing organic facewash that I really love to use every morning! It is gentle, non-irritating, refreshing and smells great without an overpowering fragrance. A small amount (rubbed between your palms) makes a nice thick creamy lather for your face. I am very happy with this product, I will purchase it again when I need to. I got the double pack, and it will stay fresh up to 2015. I like that they provide the customer with an experation date. I also like the Himalaya Walnut&Wood Apple Face Scrub that I have been using. ~Thanks!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Micro scrub not clearly stated :(
reviews.reviewText: The product is certainly good, (I love Himalaya!) bu I am disappointed because it was not clear in the description that it has actual micro scrubs pieces : ( This makes it just NON suitable for my face care routine, since I use an electric face brush with which I cant use any face wash containing micro scrubs. Now I am stuck with two of these face washes :(

I am not too sure about the smell. Some people may like it but to me it smells "old" ie) if something was old, that's what it would smell like (not that the product is old). It does work nicely though and doesn't dry my skin so I would consider purchasing again.
